projects.title: NodeJS Backend with Firebase Auth
projects.description:
# NodeJS Backend with Firebase Auth

The following project is an implementation of the firebase authentication service in a backend made in NodeJS. This has a number of advantages, such as:

- Have multiple authentication providers such as Google, Facebook, Github, Email, etc...
- Manage users from the Firebase suite and use associated services such as notifications and emails
- Have a system already tested and constantly improved by Google
projects.shortDescription: Improve your security and auth management with this authentication solution for nodejs

projects.title: Mercadopago ChekoutPro API
projects.description:
# Mercadopago CheckoutPro API

Mercadopago is a free market payment platform ,is present throughout Latin America.

The following implementation is the server that allows processing customer orders and obtaining a payment id to be later used to direct the user to the payment module within the site.

## Features

- Checkout within the same site
- Fast payment and great shopping experience for users
- Accept multiple payment methods (credit, debit,banks transferences, mercadopago account)
- Customizable
- Multiple validations, from payments to the identity of the buyer
projects.shortDescription: Fast and excellence in customer experiencie with Mercadopago checkout pro

projects.title: NestJS Ecommerce
projects.description:
# NestJS Ecommerce

The ultimate eCommerce API solution built on the powerful NestJS framework. With seamless integration capabilities, NestJS Ecommerce offers a highly customizable and scalable eCommerce platform that allows businesses to effortlessly manage and grow their online stores. Whether you're a small business owner or an enterprise-level company, NestJS Ecommerce delivers fast, reliable, and secure API services to streamline your eCommerce operations and maximize revenue. Try NestJS Ecommerce today and experience the future of eCommerce!

## Features

- API with Ecommerce Model Make CRUD operations with products, orders, users, categories.
- Authentication with JSON Web Tokens
- SQL Database
- Full interactive frontend with React.js
- Payments with Mercadopago
projects.shortDescription: Amazing and fast ecommerce with React and NestJS

projects.title: Todo Machine
projects.description:
# Todo Machine

Introducing our new Todo Machine - the ultimate task manager to help you save and organize your daily tasks effortlessly. With a simple and intuitive interface, you can quickly add, edit, and check off your to-dos on-the-go. Stay on top of your schedule and never miss a deadline again with our powerful Todo Machine. Try it now and start boosting your productivity!

## Features

- Authentication
- Save your task Secure with MongoDB
- Fast and interactive Interface
- Search bar to seek your tasks
projects.shortDescription: Organize your tasks and increase productivity with this incredible application

projects.title: Schedule App
projects.shortDescription: Booking an appointment with this incredible app, and receive payments
